type.name: org.gradle.api.plugins.quality.JDependReports
type.description: The reporting configuration for the JDepend task. Exactly one of the XML or HTML reports can be enabled when the task executes. If more than one or none is enabled, an org.gradle.api.InvalidUserDataException will be thrown.

method.name: getText
method.description:
The jdepend text report

returns:The jdepend text report

method.name: getXml
method.description:
The jdepend XML report

returns:The jdepend XML report

property.name: text
property.description:
The jdepend text report

returns:The jdepend text report

property.name: xml
property.description:
The jdepend XML report

returns:The jdepend XML report
